mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EKA.LST_HIST_ACTIVITY_WS (CLIENT_ID, PROCESS_ID, PROCESS_DATE, PROCESS_DESC, PROCESS_RESULT, METHOD, MSAH_IP, ERR, START_DATE, KEY) VALUES ( #{CLIENT_ID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{PROCESS_ID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{PROCESS_DATE, jdbcType=DATE}, #{PROCESS_DESC, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PROCESS_RESULT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{METHOD, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{MSAH_IP, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ERR, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{START_DATE, jdbcType=DATE}, #{KEY, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO EKA.SMSSERVER_OUT( TYPE , RECIPIENT , TEXT , WAP_URL , WAP_EXPIRY_DATE , WAP_SIGNAL , CREATE_DATE , ORIGINATOR , ENCODING , STATUS_REPORT , FLASH_SMS , SRC_PORT , DST_PORT , SENT_DATE , REF_NO , PRIORITY , STATUS , ERRORS , GATEWAY_ID , LUS_ID , ID_REFRENCE , JENIS , LJS_ID , MSPO_POLICY_NO , REG_SPAJ ) VALUES ( #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , EKA.UTILS.STANDARD_HP (#{recipient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , #{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{wap_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{wap_expiry_date,jdbcType=DATE} , #{wap_signal,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , to_date(#{date_created_java, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') , EKA.UTILS.STANDARD_HP(#{originator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , #{encoding,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{status_report,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{flash_sms,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{src_port,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{dst_port,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{sent_date,jdbcType=DATE} , #{ref_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER} , 'U' , #{errors,jdbcType=INTEGER} , EKA.UTILS.SMS_GATEWAY(#{gateway_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) , #{lus_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{id_refrence,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{jenis,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{ljs_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{mspo_policy_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{reg_spaj,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
